price: [We said], “This is Our gift, so give freely or withhold, without account[17].”
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
footnotes: [17] i.e., you will not be called to account thereby.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
